clinical_study.brief_title: Study on the Correlation Between Gene Mutation and TCM Syndrome Types in Metastatic Colorectal Cancer
clinical_study.official_title: Study on the Correlation Between Gene Mutation and TCM Syndrome Types in Metastatic Colorectal Cancer

lead_sponsor.agency: Shanghai University of Traditional Chinese Medicine

clinical_study.source: Shanghai University of Traditional Chinese Medicine

brief_summary.textblock: To explore the correlation between gene mutations of metastatic colorectal cancer and TCM syndrome types based on Second-generation sequencing technology.
